00017 #ifndef _VIENNACL_NORM_2_HPP_
00018 #define _VIENNACL_NORM_2_HPP_
00019 
00020 #include "viennacl/forwards.h"
00021 #include "tag_of.hpp"
00022 
00023 
00024 namespace viennacl
00025 {
00026   //
00027   // generic norm_2 function
00028   //   uses tag dispatch to identify which algorithm
00029   //   should be called 
00030   //
00031   namespace linalg 
00032   {
00033     
00034     #ifdef VIENNACL_HAVE_UBLAS
00035     // ----------------------------------------------------
00036     // UBLAS
00037     //
00038     template< typename VectorT >
00039     typename VectorT::value_type
00040     norm_2(VectorT const& vector, 
00041          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_ublas< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< VectorT >::type >::value
00042                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00043     {
00044       // std::cout << "ublas .. " << std::endl;
00045       return boost::numeric::ublas::norm_2(vector);
00046     }
00047     #endif
00048     
00049     // ----------------------------------------------------
00050     // VIENNACL
00051     //
00052     template< typename ScalarType, unsigned int alignment >
00053     viennacl::scalar_expression< const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment>, 
00054                                  const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment>,
00055                                  viennacl::op_norm_2 >
00056     norm_2(viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment> const & vector, 
00057          typename viennacl::tools::enable_if< viennacl::is_viennacl< typename viennacl::traits::tag_of< viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment> >::type >::value
00058                                             >::type* dummy = 0)
00059     {
00060       // std::cout << "viennacl .. " << std::endl;
00061       return viennacl::scalar_expression< const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment>, 
00062                                           const viennacl::vector<ScalarType, alignment>,
00063                                           viennacl::op_norm_2 >(vector, vector);
00064     }
00065 
00066   } // end namespace linalg
00067 } // end namespace viennacl
00068 #endif
